Pinwheel Floor Graphic 2012 - Fine Art

This graphic design was scored into a marble X Bond floor surface and colored using transparent concrete stains. Afterward, the whole floor received several coats of protective clear and polished wax coatings. Created for Hawkey Designs, with Matthews Construction and art assistant, Terri Lambert. Meridian club house, Rocklin, CA
